question: I want to know if there are masjids/mosques in the Bethlehem (Orange Free State) area. Will be there on business and have used your finder which does not have any listings.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
There is a Jamaat Khana in Bethlehem in Miller Street (Opposite Town Hall)

You may contact Br. Hassen Hajat at 058-3036035 / 3032493 for more
information.

Jazaakumullah and salaams

for: Darul Ifta
